title: We Played Assassin's Creed Shadows - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.23.25
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code FUNNY to get 35% off polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

We’ve played Assassin’s Creed Shadows, Celeste dev’s next game has been cancelled, and Dragon Age: The Veilguard didn’t meet sales expectations.

00:00:00 - Start
00:08:35 - Housekeeping
Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
Our Reaction to the Xbox Developer_Direct
GAMESCAST - our post show breakdown
The STREAM is Kingdom Hearts 2 w/ Mike
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get Alien In Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining & Karl Jacobs
The Roper Report   -
00:09:55 - Assassin’s Creed Shadows Preview
00:31:41 - Ad  
00:33:50 - Earthblade has been cancelled - Blog Post from Extremely OK Games
00:41:47 - Dragon Age: The Veilguard Had 1.5 Million Players in First Two Months, EA Expected 3 Million - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
00:44:30 - Palworld Developer Pocketpair Moves Into Publishing to Release Tales of Kenzera Dev's Next Game- Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:45:44 - Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3 won’t be a PS6 exclusive, producer promises - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:46:20 - Wee News!
